subject: Masters Golf Tournament
Golf
lead_paragraph: Y.E. Yang of South Korea used a hot start to reach the lead early in the second round of the Masters, but Rory McIlroy, leader for most of the first round, is back on top.
snippet: Y.E. Yang of South Korea used a hot start to reach the lead early in the second round of the Masters, but Rory McIlroy, leader for most of the first round, is back on top.
